segments.text: I think we should home school our children when we decide to have kids .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , our public schools here are not very good and private school are just too expensive . I have been reading up on home schooling and it has a lot of advantages .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Like what ? I think that by doing something like that we would be isolating our children from social interaction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , first of all , I would be able to teach them everything they learn in school in a more relaxed and fun way . I also think that having a one-on-one class is much better since you can focus more on his or her strengths or weaknesses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think neither your parents or mine would agree to such an idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will bring it up over Sunday brunch .
segments.speaker: S1
